person.persName: John Milton Johnson, Sr. (Kentucky physician and Confederate Army surgeon.)

body.p: Kentucky physician and Confederate Army surgeon. Centreville, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth P. Eaver Johnson in 1830. Father of Eliza T. Johnson and John M. Johnson, Jr. Graduated from the Kentucky School of Medicine. Moved to Ramsey, Kentucky, in 1833. Practiced medicine in Ramsey. Moved to Fredonia, Kentucky, in 1844. Moved to Marion, Kentucky, in 1848. Moved to Southland, Kentucky, in 1853. Moved to Paducah, Kentucky, in 1856. Physician in Paducah in 1860. Surgeon in the Confederate States Army in 1861. Moved to Atlanta, Georgia, in 1862. Surgeon of the Confederate post at Atlanta. Medical director of Hardee's Command.
